item.description: Hello! I'm running the Boston Marathon for Back on My Feet, a non-profit organization that works with Boston's homeless population. I'm having a fundraising party at The Pour House at 907 Boylston Street from 6 pm to 9 pm on Tuesday, March 20; cover is $10 and 100% of the proceeds go to this awesome organization. Can't make the party but still want to donate? You can do so here: www.crowdrise.com/bomfbostonmarathon/fundraiser/lindsaysilverman Lindsay
item.name: Marathon Fundraising Party
